Question
========

A pure coin is thrown up three times. Suppose event A = all times lies head up. Then what is the complement of A?

Answerlist
----------

* Three times head also lies up.
* At least once, coin lies up.
* At least two times tails are up.
* All times tails are up.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Three times also lies head up...: Incorrect
* At least one time coin lies upward: Correct
* At least two times coin lies up...: Incorrect
* All times coins lie face up: Incorrect
